name: Plighty Peasants (QDwazar)
description:
Under the rule of a greedy and hot-headed King, tend to your crops and livestock as you scramble to afford ever increasing taxes. Expand your farm and race against the mounting debt in order to give the King a piece of your mind once and for all!

Controls:

- Movement WASD

- Mouse to Look Around

- Shift to sprint

- E to interact with the environment

- Space to jump

Credits:

Students of Toronto Film School Video Game Design and Development; Video Game Design and Animation

- Programmer/Project Lead: Matyas Dudas

- 3D 2D artist: Brody Armstrong

- Level Designer: Kai Margis Gailitis

- 2D Artist: Chanel Brun-Soroka

Assets created: Voice Acting, Textures, Level design, Animation retargeting

Licensed Assets: Synty Studios; Mixamo; MiddleAgesDeco font; Sketch_Gothic_School; Layer Lab GUI PRO Kit - Fantasy RPG; Cafofo Fantasy Interface Sounds; Dynamic Village Ambience; John Leonard French Ultimate Game Music Collection.
